title: Antioxidants for male subfertility
cleaned_text: Over the last decade, a group of researchers in Australia and New Zealand have been working on a pair of Cochrane Reviews looking at the possible role of antioxidants for male and female infertility, updating these to take account of new information. The latest update of the review for men was published in December 2014 and the lead author, Marian Showell from the University of Auckland in New Zealand describes the findings.
